description: Test alert forwarded from OM Essentials.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIB-Dell-OME::omeTestAlert MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertSeverity s EXAMPLE

description: Message in the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage

description: Name of the device where alert originated.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice

description: Original severity of the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertSeverity

description: System up message from OM Essentials. Sent when OM Essentials detects a device has come online.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertSystemUp MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice s EXAMPLE

description: Message in the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage

description: Name of the device where alert originated.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice

description: System down message from OM Essentials. Sent when OM Essentials detects a device has gone offline.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertSystemDown MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice s EXAMPLE

description: Message in the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage

description: Name of the device where alert originated.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice

description: Forwarded alert from OM Essentials. The event may have originated as an SNMP trap or CIM indication to the OM Essentials Console. The alert format is normalized.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertForwardedAlert MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertSeverity s EXAMPLE

description: Message in the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage

description: Name of the device where alert originated.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice

description: Original severity of the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertSeverity

description: System monitoring alert from Essentials. Sent when status of the remote device is Unknown.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertUnknownStatus MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDataSources s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeRawAlertInfo s EXAMPLE

description: Message in the alert.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage

description: Name of the device where alert originated.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice

description: List of the data sources for which change in health status has been observed.
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDataSources

description: Message string capturing the overall status update indication.
It is a combination of global status|agent Id,from status,to status
('|' delimited further for each data source) attributes. Agent Id is a
unique identifier for every data source. Global/from/to status attributes
identify every health state (e.g. 2-Unknown, 4-OK, 8-Warning, 16-Critical).
These attributes are integer type and are specific to OpenManage Essentials only.
Format - <global-status>|<agentId-1>,<from-status>,<to-status>|...
variables.name: MIB-Dell-OME::omeRawAlertInfo

description: System monitoring alert from Essentials. Sent when status of the remote device is Normal.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertNormalStatus MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertMessage s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDevice s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeAlertDataSources s EXAMPLE MIB-Dell-OME::omeRawAlertInfo s EXAMPLE
